messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

for change sip address console november re meetings hi create meeting invites issue name appears invite link created changed name few years ago updates were made looks reverted since about instead please resolve confusing persons having meetings thank october meetings hi create meetings option available add path other colleagues reported problem well recently please advise how proceed thank
